original_title: Guitar Method for the Beginning Electric or Acoustic Guitarist
overview: Hal Leonard designed this course for students who are just learning to play electric or acoustic guitar. Subjects covered include: the parts of the guitar, tuning, chords, strumming, picking, improvisation, tablature, and standard notation. Close-ups, music notation, diagrams reinforce Hal's lessons.
title: Guitar Method for the Beginning Electric or Acoustic Guitarist
